title: person playing water polo: dark skin tone

nouns: Chemical compound formed of molecules composed of two atoms of hydrogen and one of oxygen

Binary compound that occurs at room temperature as a clear colorless odorless tasteless liquid; freezes into ice below 0 degrees centigrade and boils above 100 degrees centigrade; widely used as a solvent
The liquid form of this chemical; liquid H?O.
Common liquid (H?O) which forms rain, rivers, the sea, etc., and which makes up a large part of the bodies of organisms.
Water is a common chemical substance, that is essential to all known forms of life.
Water is a transparent fluid which forms the world's streams, lakes, oceans and rain, and is the major constituent of the fluids of living things.

description: This version of the  Person Playing Water Polo emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on support
apple_vendor_description: The person playing water polo emoji, rendered with a dark skin tone on Apple devices, captures dynamic action with a sense of athletic grace. Their form is sculpted with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading, highlighting muscular definition and fluid movement. Realistic lighting emphasizes the spray of water and the tension in their pose, conveying energy, sportsmanship, and active participation. This emoji is ideal for representing athletic pursuits, swimming, or vigorous physical activity.
